description: Pork and fennel — both fennel seed and the bulb-shaped vegetable — are often companions, and the combination of flavors is quite delicious For best results, let the chops soak for at least a few hours, preferably overnight, in a quickly made brine.
title: Brined Pork Chops With Fennel
title_page: Brined Pork Chops With Fennel Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Pork and fennel — both fennel seed and the bulb-shaped vegetable — are often companions, and the combination of flavors is quite delicious. For best results, let the chops soak for at least a few hours, preferably overnight, in a quickly made brine.
Featured in: The Irresistible Allure Of Pork And Fennel.
